description: The AWS::LookoutVision::Project type creates an Amazon Lookout for Vision project. A project is a grouping of the resources needed to create and manage a Lookout for Vision model.

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Update requires: No interruption

ProjectName.description: The name of the Amazon Lookout for Vision project
ProjectName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Amazon Lookout for Vision project

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9_\-]*  
Update requires: No interruption
